TopicTitle: Suggestion: Add a way to manage plenty of crafts in the tracking station.

Articles.Content:
I would love to be able to make groups for different crafts and be able to filter through the groups (and not through the craft type). with collapsible menus and so on.

For example:
 

+ Group: Comm sat [option A: display this group only, option B: hide this group]
| - Kerbin comsat 1

| - Kerbin comsat 2

| - Kerbin comsat 3

+ Group: Mun related  [option A: display this group only, option B: hide this group]

| - Mun Comsat 

| - Mun rover

| - Mun fuel station

 

The craft list in career mode gets annoyingly long.
What would you think of adding a maneuver editor to the tracking station?  Is this feasible since the craft are on rails when we see them in the tracking station?
